title: 1.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Mr.Jake is running an online cookie store. Each cookie box has the following price structure.
Base price = $20 per box
Tax = 5% of the base price
Shipping fee = $6 per box
A customer ordered four cookie boxes. Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to calculate the total price based on the quantity ordered.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
